001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidArgumentFunctionException;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyUriItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDecimalItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IUntypedAtomicItem;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
022
023import java.util.List;
024import java.util.Map;
025import java.util.stream.Collectors;
026import java.util.stream.Stream;
027
028import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
029import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
030
031public final class FnMinMax {
032  private static final String NAME_MIN = "min";
033  private static final String NAME_MAX = "max";
034
035  @NonNull
036  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_MIN = IFunction.builder()
037      .name(NAME_MIN)
038      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
039      .deterministic()
040      .contextIndependent()
041      .focusIndependent()
042      .argument(IArgument.builder()
043          .name("arg")
044          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
045          .zeroOrMore()
046          .build())
047      .returnType(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
048      .returnZeroOrOne()
049      .functionHandler(FnMinMax::executeMin)
050      .build();
051
052  @NonNull
053  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_MAX = IFunction.builder()
054      .name(NAME_MAX)
055      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
056      .deterministic()
057      .contextIndependent()
058      .focusIndependent()
059      .argument(IArgument.builder()
060          .name("arg")
061          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
062          .zeroOrMore()
063          .build())
064      .returnType(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
065      .returnZeroOrOne()
066      .functionHandler(FnMinMax::executeMax)
067      .build();
068
069  private FnMinMax() {
070    // disable construction
071  }
072
073  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
074  @NonNull
075  private static ISequence<IAnyAtomicItem> executeMin(
076      @NonNull IFunction function,
077      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
078      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
079      IItem focus) {
080    ISequence<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> sequence = FunctionUtils.asType(
081        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
082
083    return ISequence.of(min(sequence.getValue()));
084  }
085
086  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
087  @NonNull
088  private static ISequence<IAnyAtomicItem> executeMax(
089      @NonNull IFunction function,
090      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
091      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
092      IItem focus) {
093    ISequence<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> sequence = FunctionUtils.asType(
094        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
095
096    return ISequence.of(max(sequence.getValue()));
097  }
098
099  /**
100   * An implementation of XPath 3.1
101   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-min">fn:min</a>.
102   *
103   * @param items
104   *          the items to find the minimum value for
105   * @return the average
106   */
107  @Nullable
108  public static IAnyAtomicItem min(@NonNull List<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> items) {
109    return normalize(items)
110        .min((item1, item2) -> {
111          assert item2 != null;
112          return item1.compareTo(item2);
113        })
114        .orElse(null);
115  }
116
117  /**
118   * An implementation of XPath 3.1
119   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-max">fn:max</a>.
120   *
121   * @param items
122   *          the items to find the maximum value for
123   * @return the average
124   */
125  @Nullable
126  public static IAnyAtomicItem max(@NonNull List<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> items) {
127    return normalize(items)
128        .max((item1, item2) -> {
129          assert item2 != null;
130          return item1.compareTo(item2);
131        })
132        .orElse(null);
133  }
134
135  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.OnlyOneReturn") // readability
136  private static Stream<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> normalize(
137      @NonNull List<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> items) {
138    if (items.isEmpty()) {
139      return Stream.empty();
140    }
141
142    if (items.size() == 1) {
143      return Stream.of(items.get(0));
144    }
145
146    List<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> resultingItems = ObjectUtils.notNull(items.stream()
147        .map(item -> item instanceof IUntypedAtomicItem ? IDecimalItem.cast(item) : item)
148        .collect(Collectors.toList()));
149
150    Map<Class<? extends IAnyAtomicItem>, Integer> counts = FunctionUtils.countTypes(
151        IAnyAtomicItem.PRIMITIVE_ITEM_TYPES,
152        resultingItems);
153
154    Stream<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> stream = null;
155    if (counts.size() == 1) {
156      stream = resultingItems.stream();
157    } else if (counts.size() > 1) {
158      int size = resultingItems.size();
159      if (counts.getOrDefault(IStringItem.class, 0) + counts.getOrDefault(IAnyUriItem.class, 0) == size) {
160        stream = resultingItems.stream()
161            .map(IAnyAtomicItem::asStringItem);
162      } else if (counts.getOrDefault(IDecimalItem.class, 0) == size) {
163        stream = resultingItems.stream()
164            .map(item -> (IDecimalItem) item);
165      }
166    }
167
168    if (stream == null) {
169      throw new InvalidArgumentFunctionException(
170          InvalidArgumentFunctionException.INVALID_ARGUMENT_TYPE,
171          String.format("Values must all be of a single atomic type. Their types are '%s'.",
172              FunctionUtils.getTypes(resultingItems).stream()
173                  .map(Class::getName)
174                  .collect(Collectors.joining(","))));
175    }
176    return stream;
177  }
178}
